PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Yesterday’s Promise
PassiveDesc.Desc: On the second Scene, spawns 4 Shades that copy the appearance, stats, and Combat Pages of the assistant librarians. Once all Shades have been defeated, proceeds to the next phase.

PassiveDesc.Name: Magical Barrier
PassiveDesc.Desc: Immune to status ailments. Takes no damage from deflects. (Only active during the first phase)

PassiveDesc.Name: This is Getting Interesting
PassiveDesc.Desc: Stagger resistances change. Uses a Mass Attack page every 5 Scenes. Takes Stagger damage proportional to the number of times the dice on the Mass Attack failed to damage their targets.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shade
PassiveDesc.Desc: Has the same HP, Stagger Resist, resistances, and passive abilities as the librarian it copied. Uses their Combat Pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: I’M THE REAL ONE!!!
PassiveDesc.Desc: Uses a powerful Combat Page every 2 Scenes.
